seo_keywords: Bissell Pet Hair Eraser Turbo brush not spinning

problems.title: Brush Roll Not Turning
problems.description: The brush stops and the red light may turn on.
solution_steps: Check the belt. If broken, replace it.
Clear debris from the brush roll area.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Pet Hair Eraser Turbo Plus (24613)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $404 vacuum, and extending the life of your Bissell is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Pet Hair Eraser Turbo Plus (24613) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include strange noises and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Pet Hair Eraser Turbo Plus (24613) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
